title: Another Pixel Fraktur
content:
I know it's been done before, but this one is quite old and the lastest debate on 'evil' blackletter made me polish it off for critique. Didn't really know what else to do with it ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317170430im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
 ![pixel fraktur](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317170430im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/18501.gif)
author: mangros

comments.content:
It's not evil if you're not National Socialist about it. And you're not - more 70's young-adult book cover, especially in the leading caps. This is NOT a slam - that stuff is printed nice and clean into my memory.   
   
For my two cents, it's missing a bit or two on all the character bottoms. Nicely cleft to the pen, but a little light in the . Hit that and we can spend all day cutting and pasting in Gutenberg text just for the visual kick.   
   
Make sense? cos I'm too dr\*\*k to post an edited GIF. ;]
